feed.title: Many Notes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.9.1
entry.content: • Add the ability to disable registration for new users

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.10.0
entry.content:
• Replace the Markdown editor with Tiptap
  • Fix vault and node allowed names pattern
  • Fix modals scroll
  • Replace MariaDB with MySQL in the installation guide
  • Improve UI and UX
  • Improve codebase and documentation
  • Bump all dependencies

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.10.1
entry.content:
• Fix issues with insert internal link and image modals
  • Remove attempt to fix Tiptap extra line in codeblocks

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.10.2
entry.content:
• Fix an XSS vulnerability in a specific route where malicious Markdown files could execute JavaScript when viewed. Reported by @cyberducky0o0
  • Add MIME type validation for file and vault uploads
  • Fix unnecessary backend calls when changing edit modes in the editor
  • Add language label to code blocks
  • Update editor toolbar UI and UX
  • Adjust UI theme colors for better contrast

Thanks to Juan Soberanes (@cyberducky0o0) for responsibly disclosing the XSS vulnerability and assisting in testing the fix.

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.10.3
